content: It’s ironic that every move meant to make it easier on James will actually make it harder come playoff time. Also, because somebody mentioned HGH, I’ve always wondered why the NBA (to the best of my knowledge) doesn’t test for illegal oxygen intake (what a lot of bicycle riders get busted for). I’m not suggesting much, but I’ve never seen a player play as many minutes as James and still be so fresh. Like I can’t fathom how a player could still have enough energy left to run the entire court and make a block in the way that he did. The guy never seems to tire is all I’m saying.
